document.full_text: world number three vera zvonareva fell in the third round of the madrid open on wednesday when she lost 6-1 6-4 to 16th-seeded czech petra kvitova.
document.title: vera zvonareva loses to petra kvitova in madrid open
lines_and_colors: world number three vera zvonareva fell in the third round of the madrid open on wednesday when she lost 6-1 6-4 to 16th-seeded czech petra kvitova.
